alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Cross; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:08PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Francis, western Crittenden and southeastern Cross Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 307 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Village Creek State Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Forrest City, Wynne, Earle, Parkin, Madison, Village Creek State Park, Jennette, Whitmore, Smithdale, Cottonwood Corner, Crow Creek, Jonquil, Wittsburg, Duvall, Round Pond, Cicalla, Heth, Blackfish, Clarks Corner and Kinton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
